Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.streams.char2char

Class CreoleWriter

java.lang.Object
java.io.Writer
chav1961.purelib.streams.char2char.CreoleWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
public class CreoleWriter
extends java.io.Writer

This class converts CREOLE 1.0 content to the predefined content (see MarkupOutputFormat description). This class supports CREOLE syntax according to junghans.pdf description. XSLT can convert CREOLE to:

  • raw XML content
  • text content
  • HTML content
  • XML PDF content (according to Apache FOP, see https://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/ )

Content of the output XML is described by XSD schema creoleXML.xsd (see XMLUtils.getPurelibXSD(chav1961.purelib.enumerations.XSDCollection)). You can use this description to validate XML output

The class is not thread-safe.

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
See Also:
Creole Wiki, Writer, JUnit tests
